text: <@UD53A9UUR> Sorry I was a little late responding. I did have a kid but ended up spreading out my leave. A week here, a week there. Turns out with covid, you can’t go anywhere, so trying to save as much of it as I can until restrictions are lifted. I am not sure about other areas of the US, but here in CA you have 12 months since the baby’s DOB to use your 8 weeks of leave.
Thanks for remembering man! Hope you are well!
